modName: Stenvar - Colossal Crusher - Windhelm Mercecnary Companion Redone
summary: A face and body edit to Stenvar, a hireling found in Canderhearth Hall in Windhelm.
descriptionHtml:
This is an edit to Stenvar, the mercenary that sits by himself in Candlehearth Hall of Windhelm.
Definitely my favorite vanilla follower and character in general in the game so treat him well please. If I hear you\'ve used him for Boethiah\'s Calling (like my sister did >.>) I will not be a happy camper.

-Changes Made-
Weight set from 50 to 100. Now he\'s big buff and tough.
Set scale to 1.07. He\'ll stand out of a crowd well.
Added a Scar over his eye (hard to see in the pics because the mod I was using at the time)
Lightened his grey hair.
Washed his dirty face
Broadened his jaw and chin
Changed his eyes from hazel to light blue
His class was altered slightly so his 2hand abilities raise faster.
*If you don\'t want him to look so big you can change it with console command setnpcweight XX or setscale XX (replace Xs with value) I think somewhere between 1.03 and 1.07 seems to do the trick for me.*

-Mods I Used For My Results-
First off no mods are required these are just recommended by me.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better Males- Younger Faces Merged with Men by Geonox edited by Chris57 + Coverkhajiits by mrLenski[/url]
Despite the name of the mod he\'ll still retain his aged face.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21620]HQ Beards by Regn[/url]
At some angles and lighting his beard my become transparent, otherwise it looks fantastic.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249]Improved Eyes by Missjennabee[/url]
Of course you can use whatever eye mod you like. This was going to be a required mod but changed it up to appeal to the masses.

Check out this mod too for a better looking populous of Skyrim.[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23755]Inhabitants of Skyrim - NPC Overhaul By Rops1981[/url]

This is my 2nd mod and I\'ve had trouble with face edits in the past but I started from scratch with this one so it should be good. If there is anything wrong with it let me know and I\'ll cry over my keyboard for a bit and then go to my bed cover myself in pillows and blankets and cry some more. I may try to upload some other versions later. I know it\'s stupid but I\'m really proud of this face edit (I\'ve had it for a really long time, well similar versions rather) and it\'ll be weird to pass of my unique Sten to others but the Nexus has some nice people so I guess I can be nice too and upload this. Well here you go, for those of you who asked for it.

 -Permission Notes-
If you want to make some slight adjustments that\'s cool.
I\'d prefer if my edit were only on this site so don\'t upload anywhere else, please.

-Credits and Thank Yous-
Bethesda for making this addicting game.
And the CK
Credit is pretty much that recommended mod part... ^ up there
Thanks to those who requested it.
Thanks everyone who downloads it!
author: greyblood
